member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate the market equilibrium condition.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.MarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Returns the value of the MarketEquilibrium attribute.
member.returns: The value of the MarketEquilibrium attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.CalculateRootMarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the MarketEquilibrium attribute.
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.CalculateMarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the MarketEquilibrium attribute. Result = (producerPrice ^ elasticityOfSupply) - [(consumerConsumerPriceIndex ^ (elasticityOfSubstitution + elasticityOfDemand)) / (consumerPrice ^ elasticityOfSubstitution)]
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CentroidExtension
member.summary: Extension method to calculate the centroid solution for a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CentroidExtension.Centroid(AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex)
member.summary: Calculates the centroid solution. For a simplex with three vertices, the centroid solution is found where the line from the worst vertex to its mirror passes through the line formed by the remaining vertices.
member.returns: The centroid solution.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ContractExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate the contracted solution for a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ContractExtensions.Contract(AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex,AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Solution)
member.summary: Calculates the contracted solution. For a simplex with three vertices, the contracted solution is found by moving the worst vertice toward the centroid, but does not through it.
member.param: The centroid calculated on the simplex.
member.returns: The current worst solution moved in the direction of the centroid.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.EnforceBoundsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to enforce boundary constraints on a vector given a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.EnforceBoundsExtensions.EnforceBounds(System.Double[],AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex)
member.summary: Enforces bounds as: lower <= x <= upper
member.param: The for which to enforce boundary constraints.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.EnforceBoundsExtensions.EnforceStrictLowerBounds(System.Double[],AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex)
member.summary: Enforces bounds as: lower < x <= upper
member.param: The for which to enforce boundary constraints.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.EnforceBoundsExtensions.EnforceStrictUpperBounds(System.Double[],AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex)
member.summary: Enforces bounds as: lower <= x < upper
member.param: The for which to enforce boundary constraints.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ExpandExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate the expanded solution for a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ExpandExtensions.Expand(AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex,AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Solution,AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Solution)
member.summary: Calculates the expanded solution.
member.param: The centroid solution calculated on the .
The reflected solution calculated on the .
member.returns: The expanded solution.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ReflectExtension
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate the reflected solution for a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ReflectExtension.Reflect(AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex,AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Solution)
member.summary: Calculates the reflected solution. For a simplex with three vertices, the reflected solution is found by mirroring the worst vertex through the plane of the remaining vertices.
member.param: The centroid calculated for this simplex.
member.returns: The reflected solution.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.SwapExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to swap solutions in a .

member.summary: Replaces the worst solution with the specified solution.
member.param: The index of the current solution to be replaced.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShrinkExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to shrink the solutions of a .

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShrinkExtensions.Shrink(AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex)
member.summary: Moves each vertex halfway from its current position to the position of the best vertex.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex
member.summary: This class implements a Nelder-Mead style simplex algorithm to minimize an objective function.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Dimensions
member.summary: The dimensions of the simplex. Equal to the length of the argument vectors.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.ObjectiveFunction
member.summary: The objective function.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Iterations
member.summary: The number of iterations to attempt.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.NumberOfSolutions
member.summary: The number of solutions to employ. Equal to the number of vertices.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.LastIndex
member.summary: Equal to NumberOfSolutions - 1.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.LowerBound
member.summary: The lower bound of the search space.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.UpperBound
member.summary: The upper bound of the search space.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Solutions
member.summary: The solutions that currently define the .

member.summary: Indexed access to the vector of objects..

member.summary: The alpha constant.

member.name: F:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Contraction
member.summary: The beta constant.

member.name: F:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Expansion
member.summary: The gamma constant.

member.name: F:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.Random
member.summary: Random number generator.

member.name: P:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.TextWriter
member.summary: Set this property to the standard output for progress reporting.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.#ctor(System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double},System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Creates a simplex with the given parameters.
member.param: The lower bound of the search space. Must be less than or equal to the upper bound.
The upper bound of the search space. Must be greater than or equal to the lower bound.
The length of the argument vector.
The number of objects to use in the . Must be greater than or equal to the dimensions.
The number of iterations to attempt. Must be greater than zero.
Set this property to the standard output for progress reporting.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.Simplex.#ctor(System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double},System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Creates a simplex with the given parameters.
member.param: The lower bound of the search space. Must be less than or equal to the upper bound.
The upper bound of the search space. Must be greater than or equal to the lower bound.
The length of the argument vector.
Set this property to the standard output for progress reporting. If null, a is initialized.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateConsumerPriceIndexExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate prices for markets described by XML trees.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateConsumerPriceIndexExtensions.ConsumerPriceIndex(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Returns the value of the ConsumerPriceIndex attribute.
member.returns: The value set by the user to the "ConsumerPriceIndex" attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateConsumerPriceIndexExtensions.CalculateConsumerPriceIndex(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the ConsumerPriceIndex attribute by aggregating the price indices of itself or any sub-markets. Result = [Î£ marketShare[i] * (consumerPrice[i] ^ (1 - elasticityOfSubstitution[i])] ^ [1 / (1 - elasticityOfSubstitution)]
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to appy tariff shocks to initial prices.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ProducerPrice(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Gets the ProducerPrice attribute.
member.returns: The ConsumerPrice modified by the shock.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ShockProducerPrice(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the ProducerPrice attribute = ConsumerPrice / (1 + Shock)
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ShockAllProducerPrices(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets each ProducerPrice attribute in reverse document order = ConsumerPrice / (1 + Shock)
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to access the Shock attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockExtensions.Shock(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)

member.returns: The value set by the user to the Shock attribute.

member.summary: Sets the value of the Shock attribute.
member.param: The value to which the Shock attribute is set.
